rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 14 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 3:07 PM, 17 June 2025(Tuesday)



Intense to torrential rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in Zambales(Botolan, Cabangan, San Felipe, San Marcelino, Castillejos, San Antonio, Subic, San Narciso, Olongapo), Bataan(Morong, Mariveles, Limay), Pampanga(Porac, Floridablanca, Lubao, Macabebe, Sasmuan, Minalin, Masantol), Tarlac(Bamban, La Paz), Nueva Ecija(Licab, Quezon, Aliaga, Zaragoza), Bulacan(Hagonoy, Paombong, Malolos, Guiguinto, Plaridel, Bulakan, Obando, Meycauayan), Metro Manila(Marikina, Quezon City), Rizal(San Mateo, Cainta, Antipolo), Cavite(Silang, Amadeo, Indang, Mendez, Alfonso, General Emilio Aguinaldo, Magallanes, Maragondon, Ternate, Tagaytay), Batangas(Talisay, Tanauan, Laurel, San Nicolas, Balete), Laguna(Calamba, Cabuyao) and Quezon(Lucena, Tayabas, Pagbilao, Sariaya, Lopez, Calauag, Quezon) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
